original_title: 放送デキナイ 禁断霊映像2
overview: The second collection of psychic videos at the prohibition level, including: "The Secret of Yukan Madam", "Happiness Video Letter", "Except for humans", "Piprate Edition", "Tomorrow's Salvation", "Radio Head", "Phantom Answer (Part 1)", "Ghost Hunt", "Phantom Answer (Part 2)" and "I'm going to pick you up now."
title: Broadcast Dekinai Forbidden Spirit Video 2
